casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Carlos RODRIGUEZ. No. 302A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 26, 2016. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos. John F. Carella, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Jennifer Martin, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Patrick B. Weede, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Michael Silver, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C.

Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, For State of N.C.

Kathryn L. VandenBerg, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 26th of April 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of April 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 1st day of July 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
